LanguageData.NoItemsAreStoredHere: No items are currently stored here.
LanguageData.LWM.ContentsHeaderStacksMax: {0} stacks, max {1}, limited with total {2} of {3} kg
LanguageData.LWM.ContentsHeaderItemsMax: {0} items, max {1} (limited by {2}), with total {2} of {3} kg
LanguageData.LWM.ContentsDropDesc: Drop this item onto the floor so colonists can interact with it more easily.\n\nIf you find this button adds clutter and is not useful, you can turn it off in the mod settings.
LanguageData.LWM.ContentsHeaderMaxSize: (Cannot store items above a {0} of {1} kg)
LanguageData.LWM_DS_maxNumStacks: maximum number of stacks per cell
LanguageData.LWM_DS_maxNumStacksDesc: The maximum number of stacks that can go in a single space. Buildings two-cells large will have twice as much storage capacity.\n\nNote that other factors may reduce storage capacity.
LanguageData.LWM_DS_minNumStacks: minimum number of stacks per cell
LanguageData.LWM_DS_minNumStacksDesc: The minimum number of items that can be stored in a single space.\n\nNo matter what, this storage unit can store at least {0} items.
LanguageData.LWM_DS_maxTotalMassDesc: The maximum mass that the storage unit can hold. Once the unit is full, no more items can be added (altho most units can always store a minimum of at least two items.) Note that if the building is more than one cell large, this limit is divided evenly among all the cells.
LanguageData.LWM_DS_maxMassOfStoredItem: maximum mass of any stored item
LanguageData.LWM_DS_maxMassOfStoredItemDesc: The maximum mass of any given item that can be stored in this unit. Vanilla RimWorld doesn't have any stat for "size" so mass is used. If you are using the Combat Extended mod, they have a "Bulk" stat that is used instead.\n\nThe basic idea is the same: some items are too big to easily fit here.
LanguageData.LWM_DS_allowedCategoriesDesc: These are the categories that this unit is designed to store.\n\nIf you are using a mod besides LWM's Deep Storage, this might not be perfectly accurate. Also note: specific items may or may not fit for other reasons.
LanguageData.LWM_DS_allowedDefsDesc: These are items that this unit is designed to store.\n\nIf you are using a mod besides LWM's Deep Storage, this might not be perfectly accurate. Also note: specific items may or may not fit for other reasons.
LanguageData.LWM_DS_disallowedStuffDesc: You might think these items would be storable in this type of unit, but you would be wrong. They cannot be stored here.\n\nIf you are using a mod besides LWM's Deep Storage, this might not be perfectly accurate. Also note: specific items may or may not fit for other reasons.
